Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item boasts a wide range of features and benefits that we believe could significantly enhance your experience. Considering its quality and the value it brings, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to purchase this product at an introductory price of $150. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your life with our top-tier solution. If you're interested, please let me know and I'll guide you through the purchasing process. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
